name: Chickadee

text: Not the best ! Ordered pizza today and come up finally the crust fully burned and the toppings not cooked just raw . The temperature wasn‚Äôt correct ( cold food). Not happy with what I pay for it ! Not recommending to anyone ! There are better food places nearby the plaza.

name: Voice for Pups

text: Easy to give this place a 5 star review. Pizza is phenomenal and the service was great! You could taste how fresh the ingredients were in ever bite! Will be back, A LOT !!

text:

text: As someone from downstate New York and originally from Queens, I'd like to think I know a thing or two about good pizza, and I have to say I was pleasantly surprised by this pizza! Tasty crust, good cheese, fresh, well prepared toppings and ‚Ä¶More

text: So many choices for great pizza.  Plenty of vegan options and so delish!

name: Bruce B
text: Pizza was pretty good sauce was very good. I would give it A ++ I would go back

name: Robert Gough
text: Great find!!  Just happened in for lunch.. Have it your way, with a HUGE selection of toppings.. We had a thin crust pizza with outstanding fresh taste and flavor.. Gorganzola cheese added to one of the best pizzas we've had..  Cooked quickly with that 900 degree wood fired oven.. Try it.. You'll like it!!!

name: Ashlei M.
text: I love this place. They have something for everyone vegans, vegetarian, gluten free literally something for everyone. I also think they are reasonably priced for what you get. I get my standard pepperoni pizza and drink for under 10 and leave full.

name: Kyle Elliott
text: This place was recommended to me by a friend as I've never heard of it. Instantly made it to the top of my favorite pizza list. Go in, pick your toppings and get a fresh pizza in minutes. They also have Sriracha and various dry condiments to put on the delicious circle of yum.

name: Debra Gonzalez
text: This place is a joke. Unprofessional. Foul language everywhere from Managers and staff while waiting. Definitely not a place to take your kids or your Mom

name: Maddy Griebel
text: Lots of different topping, one size pizza for about $9 plus an extra $2 if you want a thicker crust or extra for more toppings. Pizzas are the perfect size for one person. The line moves quickly. There is shuffleboard to play and really cool decor.

name: Roni Hanson
text: They didn't say it was through GrubHub we didn't know till our driver called us saying he was list . He said he tried to call them & was giving up . Call Blaze Pizza & asked for refund told them if we knew would have not ordered . Had to ‚Ä¶More

name: Stephanie Hagberg
text: The garlic knots were good, and my coworkers pepperoni pizza was good...however, the pizza I ordered hardly had any mozzarella on it and I didn't taste any garlic.

name: Melanie Mangos
text: Their vegan pizza is absolutely amazing. It's so hard to enjoy pizza with family without anyone offering a good choice for the ones who can't have dairy. These guys are hands down amazing and delicious!!! Best pizza I honestly have ever had!!

name: Sydney Shaffer
text: Yum!! I got the art lovers pizza and it was so good. It's thin pizza which I'm not always a fan of, but they have awesome selections and it was very tasty. Good service too, all the employees were very nice and friendly!!

name: Sue Gleason
text: I love this place. I love the choices of toppings and not having to pay per topping. My kids (whom have VERY different tastes) love being able to pick out their own pizzas and everyone who works there has been very nice. I‚Äôve tried two ‚Ä¶More

name: Cody Hatch
text: Good sized pizzas, lots of toppings to choose from, and very friendly staff. Vegan chorizo was delicious and somewhat spicy.

name: KP Smith
text: The pizza is good and service is fast.  They really have this whole woodfired pizza thing down to an art.  The manager interacted with us while we were going through the line and followed up later to ensure we were enjoying our meal.  I've now eaten here twice and I have no problem with price or quality or service.  I'll be going again.

name: Christopher Butler
text: Good size pizza, all the toppings you care to put on it. Starts at 9.25 and goes up from there. Staff is friendly and service is quick. Caters to a variety of tastes and nutritional requests.

name: John Casalbore
text: I love it pizza was really good I love it pizza was really good okay

name: Calvin Do
text: Good price and quality choose your own style pizza! This style of restaurant is especially helpful if you're particular or have dietary restrictions, you can build your own pizza. The ingredients are fresh and the pizza is too. Highly recommend checking it out!

name: Javi Gonzalez
text: This has become my favorite place for pizza! The garlic paste sauce is delicious and once your pie comes out of the oven, I recommend the balsamic drizzle on top! ‚Ä¶More

name: Justin Kuczma
text: The line was out the door, but they moved quickly and effectively. Awesome all around.

name: Soumya Gupta
text: Friendly staff with delicious pizza!

name: Beth Urai
text: Lots of choices for toppings and you can build your own and add as much as you want.  They have a Keto crust that my husband has and said was good.  We enjoyed it.

name: Joseph Verdi
text: The pizza is always so fresh and flavorful

name: Bharathirajan Damodaran
text: Chipotle type Pizza.. variety. They have build your own pizza and more signature version of pizzas. For a family of three, two pizzas should be good for a dinner.

name: Alex Kreutter
text: Great pizza, reasonable prices, friendly and quick service.

name: Michael Gibson
text: Pretty good. Not bad price and food was quick for pizza. I would say that there is not a lot of choice for sides. Just salad and knots. Would've like something else.

name: Christa Lily
text: Omg! Delicious! My pizza was so good! I created my own. There is a good variety of toppings. The sauce has great flavor. The thin crust is well cooked in the wood-fire stove. I will definitely be going back. Highly recommend.

name: Alexander Stelfox
text: Awesome vegan options, really friendly staff and great prices. If you haven't been, it's a bit like a Subway but for pizza, but because they're cooked in a real pizza oven, they have an amazing flavour, and it's super quick to boot. I really like this place.

name: Cheryl Wilcox
text: Blaze pizza is amazing.  The food is delicious and fun because you get to make your own pizza and watch as they make it.  The dining area is family friendly.  I will definitely be going back.

name: Adam albright
text: Would give 6 stars if I could. This place is great. Create your own pizza, quick and tasty. Good value. Would recommend and will go back for sure.

name: Scott Stauber
text: Awesome new place. Fast, great tasting pizza .  nade fresh right in front of you. Too many choices to count. One of the only places like this with high-rise crust. Give it a try!

name: Davina Chung
text: Build your own! As many toppings as you want...

name: Emma Jackson
text: Just went to Blaze for the first time and I will definitely be back! Line was long on a Saturday night but you could tell the employees were working really hard and doing their best to be fast. Got a build your own pizza, lots of topping ‚Ä¶More

text: Loved it! Fresh pizza for everyone even gluten free and dairy free options a place the entire family can eat.

text: The crew working tonight was awesome! Got my team in and out in no time. Super friendly and good za's.

name: Anthony Perry

text: This has become my favorite place for pizza! The traditional sauce is delicious and once your pie comes out of the oven, I recommend the balsamic drizzle on top! ‚Ä¶More

text: Always great customer service. Pizza tastes amazing. I've been going there every day on my lunch break for the past week or two. I have yet to be disappointed.

name: Michael Talton
text: I can't say enough about this place And each and every "Employee".The Manager is also a respectful and professional individual that, i can see.The food is Very very very tasty.The food isn't all greasy like most restaurant's and the employees deserve a tip if you can afford it.Pizza is worth driving miles for so,enjoy the ride.

text: Love the pizza hair always eat it to Last drop and then I eat that too.

text: Love the people and the pizza

name: Mark Truitt
text: You want a delicious affordable pizza with any amount of topping you need or want. Blaze Pizza is the best around in this genre of pizza restaurants. It‚Äôs clean and has a nice environment. I heard that Landon James owns a portion of this ‚Ä¶More

name: Jayesh Shah
text: Awesome pizza... very good people... they even came to use to check everything was good. This I think is rare at any pizza place where I have been to.

name: Ian McGovern
text: Liked it more than I expected. Good pizza for a reasonable price, not as "hipster" other similar places. It's nice that most toppings are included for the same price.

text: I work in a pizzeria and I thought this pizza was pretty good so I definitely recommend it. My only issue is the staff member who took our order was pretty rude about the whole thing but at least the pizza was good.

text: Unlimited toppings on an always great pizza! Blaze has great consistency and great taste, making it one of my top options for a quick meal

name: blufoxboi
text: Amazing build-your-own pizza option! Love the thoughtfulness for people who are gluten free. Also the agua fresca is delicious!!! Love the atmosphere and the design of the place, all in all a very awesome restaurant.

name: igor p
text: Great pizza, but lately they are not up for the task.... they need new employees trained better. Pizza is not a rocket science bit some people that work there lately should put more effort and care into it....

name: Jennifer Miskell
text: Oh my gosh, first time there and will definitely be back. Vicki took care of us and was just amazing! Very sweet, great personality, and extremely helpful, being it was our first experience. She was great at explaining things and was so accommodating. Blaze Pizza, you've got some great staff!

name: L.T. Carboneau
text: Consistently the best pizza in town. Yes, there are other good places but this place is no surprises - ever - just good pizza. And, if its not right, its your own damned fault, they make it to your specifications right in front of you with fresh ingredients.

name: Joseph Marchione
text: I usually won't go to NEW places....but this place has it all..the sweetest staff I have ever found......great prices....around 8 bucks for a pizza...nice location......outdoor seating for my doggie and me... Wonderfully fresh and quality ingredients.     This place got 10 Out of 10 with me... Nothing I didn't luv about it!!!!!

name: Lauren Clifford
text: Love it here! Visited for the first time and had to return 3 days later (worth the 20+ minute drive)! The staff is great and really makes you feel welcome! I have a child with many food allergies and love that he his able to eat a gf crust with vegan cheese right off the menu. They even volunteered a glove change! I will be back often!

name: Bobbi Merenda
text: The toppings were good, but the crust tasted like cardboard. I prefer Pi Craft pizza.

name: Jose Hidalgo-Thormann
text: Great service. Pizzas are made in less than 3 minutes. The blood orange lemonade is a must.

name: Yolanda Kelley
text: The variety is the limit to the pizza that you can build.  Sometimes the pizza is a little darker than I'd like, but I do believe I can request a lighter pizza.  I will at least ask the next time I visit and I'll add another post if that's not the case.

name: John Columbo
text: New to this type of experience. Love the idea. Well worth it.

name: Tricia Monigle
text: Awesome crust and you can have as many toppings as you like!! Lots is seating.

name: Melissa Duprey
text: This place makes the best pizzas and they are great about my food allergies, changing gloves and using new clean pizza slicers etc. For me so I don't have any cross contamination. The place is always really busy when ever I've been there ‚Ä¶More

name: June Scott
text: Very good thin crust pizza made in front of you good prices also

name: Forest Sickles
text: Unique type of pizza shop. Great for gluten free needs.

name: Wallace Brown
text: Great, as long as they don't burn it! Toppings fresh a good variety of selections! Love the spicy red sauce. Anyway you want it for under $10. Great service!

name: Branden Trouskie
text: Awesome food and even better customer service. There was an issue with door dash delivery and the manager went above and beyond to make sure I was compensated. This place the amazing!

name: David Emrich
text: Food is pretty good, but if you go when it‚Äôs busy expect to wait a long time. I waited 45 minutes and wait late back to work with a line that wasn‚Äôt even half way to the door. Good food takes time, which sucks because I used to love coming here for lunch before it got crazy crowded.

name: Maurice Collen
text: Delicious Fast Fire'd pizza. Individual pizza made fresh to order using only fresh made dough and fresh toppings. You tell them exactly how you want it built and in 10 minutes you have a hot and delicious pizza. Fork and knife recommended. These pizzas can be messy. $

name: Kevin C
text: The pizza was the best of the local make your own pizzas. Every step we are allowed to ask for more of any topping. The price is a little expensive, but with a coupon it's worth the cost. Thier lemonades are also excellent. I will be going back for sure.

name: Paul Woughter
text: Blaze pizza has become one of our favorite placed to go. Less than ten minutes from walking in the door, standing in line, and ordering to sitting  down with a hot customized pizza! On a busy Saturday at lunch time as well. Highly recommend!

name: John Kuhn
text: My whole family loves this pizza. They even have a gluten free one too.

name: Raymond Miller
text: Lebron james ur always a üèÜ ur input in the üçï is heavenly, one bite of blaze pizza I floated to the skies,Grin forever service was excellent,clean, and employees gracious. Thank u

name: Daniel C. Buffum
text: Staff was patient and did their jobs well. Pizza was a great price and delicious. Will go again.

name: Tatyana Korolchuk
text: The staff was so friendly! They call you by name and it was very good service. It‚Äôs a cute place and comfortable. Glad we tried it and will definitely be back!

name: Rupansh Goantiya
text: Got a free pizza! Great customer service and great interiors.

name: Clara Mae
text: I enjoyed their " Veggie " pizza.

name: Cayla Denning
text: Good gluten free pizza. Just wish there was a way to tell what toppings they had before going. Love putting broccoli on my pizza but they only have it sometimes.

name: Megan Merriman
text: Very amazing service. The manager refilled my drink as well as my grandmother's. Food was awesome and reasonably priced. The employees were helpful and very friendly. Love it!

name: Hung Nguyen
text: Great food and atmosphere. Customer service needs some improvement.

name: Hira Abid
text: This specific branch is not the best. The food service is not the greatest. Food was okay.

name: Morgan Pagano

name: Arnela Stupac-Catello
text: Pizza tastes amazing and the ingredients are fresh. Also a plus that they now carry vegan cheese.

text: The Pesto Garlic Knots (With Extra Cheese) Are Addictive

text:
Sister recommended it, but I was disappointed.
Bought two different pizzas and they were both just so bland. It was like the pizza lost its soul

name: Vishal Nakhate

name: Mark Laughs
text: Love Blazes Pizza but have been to better establishments. Slow staff and they weren't busy at all. I was the only one in line.

text: I was tired; they fed me. They have me an excellent recommendation, it came quickly, it doesn't break the bank. They suggested I take a cup for water and gave me the wifi password. These people are heroes. ‚Ä¶More

text: First visit and won‚Äôt be my last.  The staff was friendly and informative for a first timer.  The options were plentiful but in the end the unlimited toppings, quick cook time and finishing drizzlers were great.

name: Marcia L
text: Great food made to order. Not a long wait. Pleasant employee..Nikki...did an awesome job explaining choices.

name: Christina M
text: Great food (very thin & crunchy), fast service, natural beverage selections. A great place to go with friends!

name: Amy Ferrara
text: Amazing food, great quality and fresh. Attentive, polite staff. Inviting atmosphere. Affordable. Definitely recommend!!

name: Brandon Mott
text:
*my first time there.
*staff was very attentive and worked with my allergies.

name: Amy Fisk-Inguagiato
text: Pizza was delicious. Thin crust and full of flavor. Ordered the pizza with pesto on top. Atmosphere was inviting and servers were very friendly.

name: Ernest Messina
text: Best pizza I've had in a long time. Delicious crust, great sauce, excellent choose your own topping bar. All ingredients were high quality. For vegans: Crust is vegan. Red sauces are vegan and vegan cheese available. As well as lots of veggie toppings. My new favorite!

name: Patricia Beaver
text: Fast service, friendly people and great pizza.

name: Richard Watson
text: Delicious pizza and salad. This place is fast and they allow you to fully customize your pizza or salad with loads of tasty toppings. They have vegan and gluten free options too.

name: David A
text: By far the best pizza place that also offers good personal size pizzas. My girlfriend loved her gluten free pizza with all the meat options. My pizza with extra dough and all the very was fresh and filling. The music wasn't too loud to get ‚Ä¶More

name: Bill Murphy
text: Great service, fresh ingredients, fun drink selection. Even though it's made to order, I was amazed how fast it was ready for me! Good value. Comfortable seating.

name: rhausmmd
text: Always enjoy Blaze Pizza. The ingredients are fresh and I love the fact that you can add what you want to create your own personal culinary experience! Friendly, attentive staff never been disappointed!!!

name: Catrina Mewborn
text: Great pizza unlimited toppings and they have a keto and gluten free option for the crust

name: jamie briscoe
text: Great place to eat! Food is fresh and delicious. Staff are friendly and welcoming. The only down side is they never have the dough ready for the pizza, so if there is a lot of people the wait is sometimes long. They are still my favorite pizza spot.

name: JRS
text: Went day before grand opening. Regular pizza gets 9/10 rating, while riser pizza with thicker dough gets 10/10. Fresh ingredients, cooked exactly to your order,  tastes great. Both manager and owner greeted customers a d listened to their opinions. I highly recommend and , being Italian, I am highly fussy about pizza.

name: Bakari Smith
text: Always great pizza!

name: Tammy Perrine
text: Great Pizza Great Staff

name: Stephani -D
text: Loved the white top, great customer service

name: Audrea Rapp
text: Great layout with plenty of parking. The ingredients are fresh and the pizza is fast! The vegan cheese and gluten-free options are both delicious as well. I definitely reccomend these fiery pizzas.

name: Mark Allegretti
text: Really good pizza at a reasonable price. Some unique drink choices. Fast friendly service.

name: Alex Kolberg
text: Great food with a ton of options to make your order exactly how you want it. Plus, this is one of the few pizza places that offers a dairy free option and all workers here asked about glove changing!

name: Shaun Peden
text: Stumbled into here after pizza place across the street "didn't have cheese pizza" have to say it was the happiest accident I could have came into. Pizza cooked to order in front of your face, kind staff, quick service, tons of options and most of all delicious pizza

name: Christine Caruso
text: We loved this spacious, industrial chic modern subway-style pizzeria!!  Amazing selection of delicious , fresh & healthy toppings and 100% cane sugar drinks that were out of this world.  Will definitely bring the fam. again!!  Next weekend lol!

name: Dave Kopinski
text: Had the chicken bbq pizza, each slice had one piece of chicken. The pizza was a sleeper. The ceasar salad and the fruit flavored water are winners and got that third star.

name: Edith Smith
text: Had a little lunch date with the hubby a couple days ago and decided we'd eat at Blaze Pizza.  Loved it! From the service to the pizza and drinks  (enjoyed the lemonade options), we thoroughly enjoyed ourselves.  We'll be coming back for more. They have gluten free crust, too, for those who need to keep gluten from your diet.

name: Ben Stone
text: Solid pizza place where you can put as many toppings on as you like. The pizza is ready in about 5 minutes or less. Great for a quick lunch.

name: Laurie Smith
text: Fresh homemade food.  Waitress was very nice and knowledgeable about the menu.  Going again for sure.

name: Linda Brink
text: It claims to be "fast"  it was quite the opposite.  I left before I even got to order.

name: Vibhor Dutt
text: Great pizza. Totally worth visiting. Any day would recommend it over the regular pizza chains just coz of the amount of toppings you can add for free of charge!

name: John Fayard
text: Great pizza!! Was on the higher end but definitely worth it!

name: kay cartledge
text: It was a awesome  experience,I am talking about the food..the staff was very pleasant .awesome place please tell the owner ...

name: James Lahey
text: The pizza is absolutely phenomenal. The white cream sauce is to die for. But I wish they served liquor

name: RISHABH TRIVEDI
text: Best pizza ever!! My sensational pizza was prepared by Airen. She nailed it#love from india

name: Kristan Crowell
text: Blaze is our favorite pizza! There are so many customizations you can make to achieve your own pizza perfection!

name: Peter Traeg
text: Enjoyed the pizza. Service was quick.

name: Jay See
text: This place is absolutely incredible. I live in Fairport, but if I am craving pizza, I will drive out to here without hesitation. Amazing food and the customer service is equally as good.

name: Tom Harrison
text: Fantastic customer service. Delicious pizza.

name: Jennifer Vibber
text: This place has good, make your own, fast pizzas for a great price. The soda and drink selection is unique as well. They also do fundraising for non profit organizations.

name: Todd Crawford
text: Innovative pizza ideas.  They are a lot of fun to try the different possible combinations.

name: K Jackson
text: Although the underlying flavors were good, there was so much char on my pizza. The bottom was completely black on the underside of half my pie. As a matter of fact, there was even char from the oven on the top, too. Yes, I know it's wood fired pizza, but the oven does need to be cleaned/ scraped regularly.

name: Dj Quan da bomb Def Town Boss
text: Pretty good pizza had great service for my brother when I was there

name: Samantha Barnard
text: My favorite pizza place! Sometimes the service isn't as friendly as you'd hope. But I'll endure for some wood fire  pizzaüçï

name: Jamillah Webb
text: Customer Service amongst all the staff is exceptional..love the vegan options, juice flavors and cleanliness of this establishment..

name: Teresa Thomas
text: I absolutely enjoyed my experience at Blaze Pizza.  I was able to walk in, place my order and get my order in a very timely matter.  My pizza was delicious! Thank you

name: J P
text: Really cool experience. Customizable Pizza, vegan / vegetarian friendly. Really interesting and tasty flavors.

name: grumps first grandson
text: Good pizza, garlic knots are yummy, salad is good if you are a rabbit and like that sort of thing. Staff is always pleasant and fun to joke around with. Nice atmosphere. Reasonable prices, quick.

name: Steven Zgonce
text: They were quick and easy to navigate the menu

name: Joe Woidich
text: Same concept as Pieology pizza, but the staff puts on lots more toppings. Great pizza!

name: Elizabeth Maywalt
text: Fast and delicious made to order pizza with a fun atmosphere.

name: N George
text: Good thin pizza. I enjoyed the spicy red sauce. Confirming if your pizza has enough cheese is an appreciated touch. Have eaten here twice and will be back.

name: Michael Macwilliams
text: Excellent gluten free crust. Good to feel like I got a normal sized pizza again

name: Carolyn Zyloney
text: Enjoyed my pizza. Crust is thin but good ratio of meat to cheese. Pizza is made quickly and efficiently

name: susan rizzo
text: Ordered a simple pie, which was hot and tasty with a nice thin crust.  Plentiful options to customize (eg, more cheese? a finishing sauce like balsamic glaze?).  Because the pie didn't emerge picture perfect from the oven, Blaze insisted we ‚Ä¶More

name: Joseph Radwan
text: Portions are worth the price and the food tastes delicious‚Äì I mean it better be when you choose what to put on it. I have yet to see this place crowded

name: Kia Danzy
text: i love that u can customize your own pizza, just how u like it......and it doesn't take that long.....love it

name: Scott Duntley
text: Good selection. Quick service. Overall very tasty.

name: Jy Kelley
text: This place has some of the best pizza I've ever had without question. Decent price,  great food, and great service.

name: Sara Isabelle
text: Love this place. I was so happy they had a vegan cheese option. You can load the pizza up with as many veggies as you want too which is so awesome. Best vegan pizza I've ever had. I'll be back many times for sure üòã

name: Scott Sultar
text: Great pizza , made fresh to order in about 5 minutes.

name: cory green
text: Fast, efficient and delicious.  Hard to get through quickly during the lunch rush but that's just due to high demand from such an awesome establishment.

name: rocco mastrangioli
text: Fresh,delicious dough,a variety of sauce,and topping to satisfy meat and vegetarians eaters. Great price,very friendly and helpful staff. Cheaper than delivery

name: DWAYNE ROBINSON
text: I like the build ur own pizza option. They had nice condiments 2 choose from. Will return?

name: Thomas Sortino
text: Good food as always, great staff, although we overwhelmed them a bit with a 7-pie order. They did well, and all was good and fresh.

name: Cameron Shiley
text: Probably the best pizza I have ever had. The quality is amazing. To bad I can't give it 10 stars!!

name: Alex Soles
text: Its okay but I wouldn't recommend to my friends or family. If I happen to have friends that invited me here it isn't bad enough where I wouldn't show up. The pizza is NY style thin crust which I like. I ordered the bbq chicken pizza and it ‚Ä¶More

name: Laura Burley
text: Besides the food being fantastic, the service was over the top! We just went for dinner tonight and will be frequent customers! Thank you for being such a great team!

name: Christian Gutierrez
text: This place is awesome! I much prefer this over PieCraft. This is because you can put literally anything you want on your pizza without that extra cost. My only knock on this was that the place itself could have been a BIT cleaner. Nothing disgusting by any means but not perfect. Other then that tho awesome!

name: Tony V
text: It's a fast fired pizza. If you like that style then you probably know what to expect. Crust is pretty thin, pizza is kind of small. Sure you can have all the toppings you want on it, but the style of pizza makes for a cooked dough with ‚Ä¶More

name: Laurel Charles
text: Love the idea of choosing my own toppings. All for one price.

name: Gavin playz mc
text: Lines can get long,  but definitely worth the wait!  Our pie was a little to burnt and with no question they refired a new one.  Thanks for a great experience!

name: Kisha G
text: this place definitely feeds my pizza craving which i couldn't satisfy for years due to needing a gluten free, dairy free option. the crust is thin but tastes great ( not like the pre-frozen cardboard you get at other places). the vegan ‚Ä¶More

name: Dennis Nichols-Faber
text: Great pizza and the price is not expensive

name: Aaron Forisha
text: Great personal pizzas. Quality fresh toppings of which you can have as many as you want for no extra charge. Price is right. I hope this place sticks around for a while!

name: Kris Corpus
text: Great pizza within 5mins from start to finish. Inside and tables gave me the vibe of Chiptole which isn't a bad thing. Simple yet effective and looks good. Super cheap bc you can get any and all toppings for $8.95 or one topping for $1 less. Highly recommend getting the garlic knots too!

name: Dom Rossi
text: Nice friendly staff, good pizza. Slightly better than pi craft.

name: Mark Wright sr
text: Good pizza

name: Jon Fernando
text: These small "craft" pizza places have been popping up. Of the ones here locally, I like Blaze a bit more between their dough and size and the assortment of toppings. Fountain drinks are good too!

name: Taran Bemis
text: Amazing pizza! The only thing "bad" is how difficult the strawless lids are to put on the cups, but saving the environment definitely makes up for it

name: Paul Schultz
text: The concept is cool. The pizza was delicious.

name: Debra Siegel
text: Fast friendly service. Pizza was good.

name: Arazio Pippo
text:
Bad Service, The restroom out of order, table no cleaning...the pizzas no good
ALL BAD...

name: John Bednarczyk
text: Friendly staff,  comfortable environment,  good pizza, plenty of seating and parking available.

name: Meredith Dunbar
text: w mm

name: Mary D'Alessandro
text: Ate there yesterday. Food was great. Called to order 10 pizza's for pick-up. Waited on hold for 10 minutes.  Hung up. Did not call back. That wait time is un-acceptable.

name: Terry Youmans
text: Love it. Wonderful experience!

name: Jamie Kolberg
text: Love to pick my own topings great service.

name: Brian O'Keefe
text: Great staff and good pizza.  I sprung for the unlimited toppings and probably got carried away.   I'll try something a little simpler next time.

name: Tracey Kuhn
text: Always enjoy a good pizza here.

name: John LeBrun
text: Overall, its a good place to go if you're in the area, but there are superior alternatives. Atmosphere-wise, it felt more like a cafeteria than a restaurant. While we got our food surprisingly quick, the price came out to be two dollars ‚Ä¶More

name: B. D. Reddy
text: I like it - thin crust style, lots of topping options, made quick, and when I went they could warm up some chocolate chip cookies in the oven too for a nice warm gooey dessert.

name: Sebastian Iturregui-Shelton
text: Delicious pizza that you can customize to what you want. Good selection of items but not overwhelming compared to other craft-style restaurants. Atmosphere was open and welcoming and the staff were all friendly and helpful.

name: Ana G
text: Always come here to eat between classes :)

name: D. G.
text: You build your own pizza..that is Great thing

name: Kerry McLaughlin
text: A different concept for pizza, more of an artisan on the go flair. The gluten free crust was delicious, service prompt and price reasonable.

name: Jeremy Walraven
text: Awesome build your own pizza, love the amount of options they have. And it's a very reasonable price for unlimited toppings.

name: Ronak Rao
text:
I like this pizza place, serving great pizza! They served free pizza with unlimited toppings. Go with a coupon and enjoy your free pizza!
The best thing about this place is they do serve you fresh pizza in 180 second.....Amazing!!!!!

name: BRENT OAKS
text: Good pizza, love the idea you can put his many toppings on as you want

name: Thomas Lombard
text: Very good  like the spicy sause

name: paul brown
text: Great pizza and great staff.

name: Josh Best
text: Crust was burnt crispy

name: Sara Maher
text: Very good pizza. Good prices and fast service! Definitely would recommend. I will be back for sure!

name: Karen Scheuermann
text: We ordered 3 large pizzas plus a gluten free pizza. All were mouth wateringly delicious. The gluten free pizza was made with broccoli and ricotta cheese. Yum.

name: Steve Benjamin
text: Great pizza the way you want it. Good value.

name: joanne dingwall
text: Great pizza great variety of toppings

name: Donald Mannise
text: Always a great experience at Blaze. It has quickly become a go-to destination for food amongst my friends

name: Gabe V
text: What an exciting and different way to order pizza in 3 minutes in a modern industrial setting! Lyndsey manages very well, remembers names of repeat customers,  focuses on great quality service/accuracy and has a welcoming smile. Her peers ‚Ä¶More

name: Karen Cermak
text: It was neat to see how fast they could do a really good pizza with what I wanted on it

name: Jessica Feeney
text: Amazing service, every person I saw used my name and asked me how I was doing. Fantastic job!

name: Isabelino rodriguez
text: Awesome pizza you pick a bunch of toppings you want... Not pricey...and the pizza is made in a fire oven...recommed...

name: Michael
text: Delicious and affordable! Staff are all super nice

name: D Campbell
text: Crust was a little different, flat not raised. Toppings were good.

name: Leah G
text: Fun and unique experience! Staff was extremely friendly and helpful. Pizza was absolutely delicious.

name: Graeme
text: Great cheap pizza! thing and crispy, great toppings.

name: Paul Mal
text: Pizza is amazing! Very cool modern place very clean and nice ppl. Customize your pizza how ever u want and It‚Äôs ready fast! Actual fire pizza oven

name: Rachael Griffin
text: Great pizza nice atmosphere

name: Karen Tabor
text: Good wood fired pizza. Nice variety of toppings.

name: Karan Thompson
text: Yum! Custom made pizza with a great variety of sauces, toppings and drizzles. Friendly service. We'll be back!

name: Brittany White
text: Love it here! Food is great and decently priced compare to other places. Also a very green place!

name: Jraemieds_roc
text: Crust is thin, crispy, and delicious. I made the mistake of opting for the spicy red sauce and it doesn't mess around! DO NOT order the spicy red sauce unless you can handle the heat. They have assorted lemonades, ice tea, and fountain ‚Ä¶More

name: Joe Burress
text: Delicious.   Staff was very friendly.   Great atmosphere!!!

name: Annie Simpson
text: Their pizza is so yummy. It's fresh made to order. You should try it at least once.

name: Bret Burrows
text: Very good, even good options for people with dairy and nut allergies.

name: Erwin Bushart
text: Very good. I like thin crust and it is fast.

name: Stephen P
text: Manager does a great job and you can see that in his employees.

name: Trevor Barg
text: Great pizza and toppings for a great price

name: Kolby Botka
text: Expensive, but efficient. Quick meal for lunch breaks, they also have a very dynamic and interesting menu with pizza combos I would have never thought of. ‚Ä¶More

name: Sean Vhloche
text: Good selection of tasty options for pizza and salad, only thing missing was anchovies. LoL.

name: Benjamin T
text: Great pizza, quick service and a fun atmosphere! We will be visiting again!!

name: Stephen Gibson
text: Better than I expected...and it's good for the low price too

name: Sujal Desai
text: Best pizza till date

name: Felix Belliard
text: Great pizza!!!

name: Adam Hansen
text: So good! Will be better when you can get beer there

name: Julie Cochran
text: Amazing eats!

name: Barbara Clark
text: I love the fact that I can put what I want on the pizza and the kids can do the same, no more fighting about what goes on our pizza. This place is great!!

name: Brian Coe
text: Delicious pizza and fast friendly service. Went for a work function and would live to go back again

name: Beth
text: Great I believe better tha pi pizza

name: Mary Morris
text: Pleasantly surprised the pizza was very good customer service was excellent prices were reasonable

name: Michael Shon
text: Excellent, fresh ingredients for specialty pizzas, or design your own as you move down the line past them. High temp wood fired oven cooks pizzas fast. Lots of table seating. The noise level at times makes it hard for the staff to hear what you say, but 5 stars anyway

name: Michelle Swackhammer
text: Such a great idea to make individual pizzas, no need for the usual compromise everyone has to make when getting a large group pizza, here everyone's happy with their toppings!

name: Hunter Seaward
text: Hands down best pizza in Henrietta. Highly suggest giving Blaze Pizza a try if you‚Äôre in the area! Quick service, friendly staff, reasonably priced, great pizza!

name: Chris Burrows
text: Went to try this place out, says they‚Äôre open till 10 doors lock at 9:20. Some guy there says he‚Äôs from corporate and they‚Äôre closing early tonight. Way to put in the effort for your new restaurant. It‚Äôs not gonna last

name: Tachana frye
text: Delicious and staff is very friendly

name: Patricia G
text: My sister and I went here today for the first time. The pizza was amazing and the staff were so nice!! Deff will be going back!

name: WD Stewart
text: Pizza offers great and unique flavors. Line takes a little while, but pizzas are done very quickly.

name: BlueT GreenL
text: First time there with the at home store crew, it was lovely, pizza is delicious and a fare price for the size of the pizzas, staff very professional and kind, great place to eat and hang out, totally recommend it!!

name: Pankaj Kashyap
text: The pizza there was very good

name: Deborah McAlpine
text: Love this place and the gluten free pizza.

name: Savannah Moore
text: Free pizza day was so much fun, and the pizzas turned out fantastic! The 9pm close time was only for this event, and was clearly stated on the flyers

name: Tim Bushnell
text: Great value for your edible creativity.

name: Milsa Franco
text: The pizza is amazing I highly recommend üòÅ

name: Amanda Proctor
text: My 6 year old says this is the best pizza ever! Great,  fresh ingredients,  awesome price,  very clean, and the staff is great!

name: Robert Holland
text: Good pizza and a unique concept

name: Noah Girolamo
text: Excellent food!! very, very good service/staff!  great atmosphere- will be back !!!!

name: Kasandria Cruz
text: Today is 3.14 and the line is moving along. Always friendly and fast.

name: Jaimee Lindvay
text: Great pizza and very accommodating. Interesting topping choices too

name: Deborah Cline
text: Good pizza. They have make your own pizzas as there main item.
